alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Comanche; Cotton; Grady; Jefferson; McClain; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Comanche, northwestern Jefferson, Grady, southeastern Caddo, western Stephens, Cotton and southwestern McClain Counties through 230 AM CDT... At 200 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chickasha to 4 miles southeast of Devol. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eastern Lawton, Duncan, Chickasha, Newcastle, Blanchard, Marlow, Walters, Elgin, Goldsby, Geronimo, Rush Springs, Bray, Fletcher, Cyril, Temple, Dibble, Sterling, Cole, Alex, and Verden. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 104 and 107. Interstate 44 between mile markers 6 and 38, and between mile markers 55 and 94. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Caddo; Comanche; Cotton; Grady; Jefferson; McClain; Stephens
